meanings.sent1: The rubber band was nonrigid and easily stretched.
meanings.sent2: The tree branches swayed in the wind, showing their nonrigid nature.
meanings.sent3: The nonrigid jellyfish danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent4: Her nonrigid thoughts flowed freely, unrestricted by boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The nonrigid fabric draped elegantly over the chair.

meanings.definition: Not adhering strictly to a fixed pattern or set of rules.
meanings.sent1: His nonrigid schedule allowed for spontaneity and fun.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonrigid style was always evolving and changing.
meanings.sent3: The nonrigid traffic rules led to chaos on the roads.
meanings.sent4: Her nonrigid interpretation of the poem brought new meaning to the words.
meanings.sent5: The nonrigid boundaries of the park encouraged exploration and discovery.
